entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Kananaskis (Nakiska Ridgetop)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then clearing. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
